clubs.name: Teddington Cricket Club
clubs.description: One of the oldest and most prestigious cricket clubs in Surrey, established in 1867. Home to multiple senior XIs, thriving colts section, and a vibrant social scene.
clubs.address: Bushy Park Sports Ground, Sandy Lane

clubs.name: Highbury United FC
clubs.description: Community football club established in 1952, competing in the Middlesex County Football League. Home to men's, women's, and youth teams with excellent facilities.

clubs.name: Richmond Hockey Club
clubs.description: Premier hockey club in South West London, founded in 1890. Men's and Ladies' teams competing in National League, plus thriving junior and masters sections.
clubs.address: Old Deer Park, Richmond Athletic Ground

clubs.name: Marylebone Cricket Club
clubs.description: Historic cricket club in Central London, founded in 1787. Home to competitive league cricket, social cricket, and a welcoming members' club with excellent bar facilities.

membershipTypes.name: Senior Playing
membershipTypes.description: Full playing membership for adults 18+. Includes all league and friendly matches, net sessions, social events, and bar privileges.

membershipTypes.name: Junior Playing
membershipTypes.description: Full playing membership for players under 18. Includes colts training, age-group matches, and pathway to senior cricket.

membershipTypes.name: Family
membershipTypes.description: Perfect for cricket families! Includes 2 adult playing members and up to 4 junior playing members.

membershipTypes.name: Social
membershipTypes.description: Non-playing membership with full social privileges. Access to clubhouse, bar, and social events.

membershipTypes.name: Senior Player
membershipTypes.description: Full playing membership for adults 18+. Includes all league matches, training sessions, cup competitions, and social events.

membershipTypes.name: Youth Player
membershipTypes.description: Playing membership for players aged 8-17. Includes weekly training, age-group matches, and pathway to senior football.

membershipTypes.name: Women's Player
membershipTypes.description: Full playing membership for the Women's 1st and 2nd teams. Includes all training, matches, and social events.

membershipTypes.name: Veterans
membershipTypes.description: Over-35s football. Includes weekly training, veterans league matches, and social events.

membershipTypes.name: Social Member
membershipTypes.description: Non-playing membership. Access to clubhouse, bar, and all social events. Perfect for supporters!

membershipTypes.name: Senior Playing
membershipTypes.description: Full playing membership for adults 18+. Includes all league matches, training, indoor hockey, and social events.

membershipTypes.name: Junior Player
membershipTypes.description: Playing membership for juniors aged 6-17. Weekly coaching, age-group matches, and hockey camps.

membershipTypes.name: Masters
membershipTypes.description: Over-40s hockey for men and women. Relaxed but competitive hockey with social emphasis.

membershipTypes.name: Student
membershipTypes.description: Discounted membership for full-time students aged 18-25. Full playing privileges.

membershipTypes.name: Social
membershipTypes.description: Non-playing membership. Access to clubhouse, bar, and social events. Ideal for partners and supporters.

membershipTypes.name: Full Playing
membershipTypes.description: Full playing membership for adults. Includes all league and friendly matches, practice facilities, and clubhouse access.

membershipTypes.name: Junior
membershipTypes.description: Playing membership for juniors 8-17. Coaching, colts matches, and pathway to senior cricket.

membershipTypes.name: Social
membershipTypes.description: Non-playing membership with full social privileges. Perfect for cricket lovers and networkers.

membershipTypes.name: Corporate
membershipTypes.description: Corporate membership for businesses. Includes hospitality days, networking events, and guest passes.

venues.name: Main Ground - Bushy Park
venues.description: Historic first-class standard cricket ground with excellent facilities. Hosts all 1st XI matches.
venues.facilities: Sightscreens, Electronic scoreboard, Pavilion viewing, Hospitality marquee

venues.name: Practice Nets
venues.description: Four all-weather practice nets with artificial surfaces. Bowling machine available.
venues.facilities: Artificial wicket, Bowling machine, Protective netting

venues.name: Pavilion & Clubhouse
venues.description: Traditional cricket pavilion with bar, changing rooms, and function space.
venues.facilities: Licensed bar, Kitchen, Function room, Changing rooms

venues.name: Highbury Fields Main Pitch
venues.description: FA-standard grass pitch with floodlights. Home to 1st and 2nd team matches.
venues.facilities: Floodlights, Covered dugouts, PA system, Scoreboard

venues.name: Training Ground
venues.description: All-weather 3G training pitch. Perfect for training in all conditions.

venues.name: Youth Pitches
venues.description: Two junior-sized pitches for U8-U14 matches and training.
venues.facilities: Junior goals, Corner flags, First aid station

venues.name: Clubhouse
venues.description: Modern clubhouse with bar, function room, and changing facilities.
venues.facilities: Licensed bar, Big screen TV, Kitchen, Changing rooms, Showers

venues.name: Main Water-Based Pitch
venues.description: FIH-approved water-based artificial pitch. Home to all 1st XI matches.
venues.facilities: Water-based turf, Floodlights, Electronic scoreboard, Dugouts

venues.name: Sand-Based Training Pitch
venues.description: Sand-based artificial pitch for training and lower league matches.

venues.name: Indoor Sports Hall
venues.description: Full-size indoor hockey hall for winter training and indoor league.

venues.name: Pavilion
venues.description: Historic pavilion with bar, changing rooms, and function space.
venues.facilities: Licensed bar, Kitchen, Viewing balcony, Function room

venues.name: Regent's Park Ground
venues.description: Beautiful cricket ground in the heart of Regent's Park. Historic setting with pavilion views.

venues.name: Practice Nets
venues.description: Three practice nets adjacent to the main ground. Available for member booking.

venues.name: The Long Room
venues.description: Elegant function room perfect for corporate events and private dining.
venues.facilities: Bar, Catering kitchen, AV equipment, Air conditioning

fees.name: Senior Playing Membership - Annual
fees.description: Annual membership fee for senior playing members (18+)

fees.name: Match Fee - Senior
fees.description: Per match contribution for senior players

fees.name: Match Day Fee
fees.description: Per match fee to cover referee and pitch costs

fees.name: Youth Kit Pack
fees.description: Full youth kit including shirt, shorts, socks, and bag

recurringSchedules.title: Senior Net Practice
recurringSchedules.description: Weekly net practice for all senior playing members.

recurringSchedules.title: Youth Academy
recurringSchedules.description: U10-U14 training session with qualified coaches.

recurringSchedules.title: Women's Training
recurringSchedules.description: Training session for women's 1st and development teams.

recurringSchedules.title: Men's 1st XI Training
recurringSchedules.description: High intensity training for 1st XI squad.

recurringSchedules.title: Senior Nets
recurringSchedules.description: Weekly net practice for all senior members.

recurringSchedules.title: Colts Coaching
recurringSchedules.description: Junior coaching session with ECB-qualified coaches.

sessions.title: Pre-Season Friendy Prep
sessions.description: Tactical session ahead of pre-season friendlies.

sessions.title: Goalkeeping Clinic
sessions.description: Specialist goalkeeper training for all ages.

sessions.title: Beginners Hockey
sessions.description: Introduction to hockey for new players.

sessions.title: Spin Bowling Workshop
sessions.description: Learn spin bowling from county coaches.

events.description: Home league match against local rivals.

events.title: Club Quiz Night
events.description: Annual quiz with fish and chips supper.

events.title: 1st Team vs Islington Rangers
events.description: Home league match - top of the table clash!

events.title: Youth Awards Night
events.description: Annual presentation evening for youth players.

events.title: Women's Team Charity Match
events.description: Charity match raising funds for local hospice.

events.title: Men's 1st XI vs Surbiton
events.description: Top of the table National League clash.

events.title: End of Season Ball
events.description: Black tie ball celebrating the season.

events.title: Junior Hockey Festival
events.description: Fun day for all junior members and families.

events.title: Annual Dinner & Awards
events.description: Black tie dinner and presentation evening.

events.title: AGM
events.description: Annual General Meeting for all members.

competitions.description: Top tier of English club hockey.
